name: Royal Princess Wedding Makeup
description:
Every Bride wants to look amazing in her dream wedding salon, every Princess
wants to look beautiful with stylist fashion in her wedding salon, every
Indian princess wants to be herself the most beautiful bride in her own
wedding. The Royal Princess Wedding Makeup & Dress up Salon is a unique
game about all, bride and groom, makeup and dress up, traditions and
customs, fashion and style, ethnic and modern, wedding salons.
* Spa Section: Clean-up, use the water sprayer, apply face-mask, add
concealer nail manicure pedicure and so on
*Makeup Section: Apply make-up including lipstick, eye-shadow, eye-
liner, powder and face paint! Change hair styles and so on
*DRESS UP for boys Section: The bride wore a red dress during
the wedding salon program
*Wedding Salon: The bride and groom exchange Varmala with each other.
The wedding begins with "Kania Daan" and the bride's parents hand her
over to the groom.
Features:
- Prepare for the wedding salon ceremony
- Indian Wedding Salon Invitation
- Indian wedding salon makeup
Indian wedding salon
- Try lipstick, face glow, necklace in our princess makeup game
- Indian Nail Art Salon
- Indian nail spa
- Top country theme wedding salon
- Manicure, pedicure
- Indian culture
- Wedding salon
- Royal Princess Salon and Spa
- Princess Wedding Salon Makeup
- Indian nail spa and romance
Lets download and play the Indian royal wedding makeup and dress
up salon game
